com.vaadin.addon.charts.model
Class AbstractTitle

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.AbstractConfigurationObject
      com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.AbstractTitle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SubTitle, Title
public abstract class AbstractTitle
extends AbstractConfigurationObject

Abstract base for Title classes (namely Title and Subtitle)

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

isFloating

public boolean isFloating()
Returns:
whether the title is floating or not, false if undefined.
See Also:
setFloating(Boolean)

setFloating

public void setFloating(Boolean floating)
When the title is floating, the plot area will not move to make space for it. Defaults to false.

Parameters:
floating - the floating to set

getVerticalAlign

public VerticalAlign getVerticalAlign()
Returns:
the verticalAlign
See Also:
setVerticalAlign(VerticalAlign)

setVerticalAlign

public void setVerticalAlign(VerticalAlign verticalAlign)
Sets the vertical alignment of the title. Can be one of VerticalAlign.TOP, VerticalAlign.MIDDLE and VerticalAlign.BOTTOM. Defaults to VerticalAlign.TOP.

Parameters:
verticalAlign - the align to set

getHorizontalAlign

public HorizontalAlign getHorizontalAlign()
Returns:
the horizontal alignment
See Also:
setHorizontalAlign(HorizontalAlign)

setHorizontalAlign

public void setHorizontalAlign(HorizontalAlign horizontalAlign)
The horizontal alignment of the title. Can be one of HorizontalAlign.LEFT, HorizontalAlign.CENTER and HorizontalAlign.RIGHT. Defaults to HorizontalAlign.CENTER .

Parameters:
horizontalAlign - the alignment to set

getText

public String getText()
Returns:
the text of the title
See Also:
setText(String)

setText

public void setText(String text)
Set the text of the title for the chart. To disable the title, set the text to null. Defaults to "Chart title".

Parameters:
text - the text to set

getStyle

public Style getStyle()
Returns:
the style of the title
See Also:
setStyle(Style)

setStyle

public void setStyle(Style style)
Sets the CSS styles for the title. Use this for font styling, but use setHorizontalAlign(HorizontalAlign), setVerticalAlign(VerticalAlign), setX(Number) and setY(Number) for text alignment.

Parameters:
style - the style to set

getX

public Number getX()
Returns:
the X position of the title
See Also:
setX(Number)

setX

public void setX(Number x)
The X position of the title relative to the alignment within chart.spacingLeft and chart.spacingRight. Defaults to 0.

Parameters:
x - the X position to set

getY

public Number getY()
Returns:
the Y position of the title
See Also:
setY(Number)

setY

public void setY(Number y)
The Y position of the title relative to the alignment within chart.spacingTop and chart.spacingBottom. Defaults to 15.

Parameters:
y - the Y position to set
